mapper.select: select id, name, description, file_name, update_time from dust_article where id=#{article.id} order by update_time desc;
mapper.insert: insert into dust_article(name, description, file_name, update_time) value(#{article.name}, #{article.description}, #{article.fileName}, #{article.updateTime})
mapper.select: select dust_tag.* from dust_article_tag, dust_tag where article_id=#{id} and dust_article_tag.tag_id=dust_tag.id;
select du.id,du.name from dust_user_article dua, dust_user du where dua.article_id=#{id} and dua.user_id=du.id
select count(user_id) from dust_article_fans where article_id=#{article.id};
